title: How does science shape science and technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: The defintion of science as given in disctionaries and as understood by us is incomplete. Today, the developed theories of science cannot explain many phenomenon occurring in universe. Therefore, I am rephasing your question as - How does knowledge shape science and technology? The knowledge from Supreme Consciousness that is recorded in the Universal Mind, shapes science and technology. This process is contInuous, an will contiue till the stage of saturation of ENTROPY reaches.
